snippet: An amendment for the Export-Import Bank, which facilitates the sale of American goods overseas, has been holding up the jobs bill while Congress decides whether to grant it more funding.
abstract: Amendment for the Export-Import Bank, which facilitates the sale of American goods overseas, has been holding up the jobs bill to aid small businesses while Congress decides whether to grant it more funding; stand-off is dividing Congress and Republicans, many of whom support the bank's reauthorization.
lead_paragraph: An amendment for the Export-Import Bank, which facilitates the sale of American goods overseas, has been holding up the jobs bill while Congress decides whether to grant it more funding.

headline.seo: Jobs Bill Stalls Amid Fight Over Agency
headline.main: Jobs Bill Stalls as Congress Fights Over Agency
headline.print_headline: Jobs Bill Stalls as Congress Fights Over Agency
